Text: can u help me?..i want to upload a torrent but it always says wrong tracker...how can i fix that?
Mempan: The tracker url has to be http://tpb.tracker.thepiratebay.org/announce in your torrent. If not, piratebay will not accept your torrent.

Thanks so much for this. I have this as a vinyl LP - but with different tracklisting - and am very happy to have it now in digital. 

Please post again if you have anymore 'Colourbox' - "Arena" was my all time favourite track of theirs.

Shankly: Most music from 4AD Records, include Colourbox, are great music.
I'll post "Arena" - soon or later ;-)
